document_title: Salmonella bacterial infection: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis, prevention
subsection_content:
Most cases of salmonella infection are diagnosed based on symptoms. In addition, the doctor may also prescribe the following additional tests to get the most accurate conclusions: (4)
Stool sample testing; Blood sample testing
